Hi, where can I find my API key?

Hi Artem! You can find your API key by following the steps in our API Integration Guide. Once your token request is approved, you will receive an API key, which is used to authenticate your API requests. Make sure to keep this key secure and do not share it publicly. For more details, you can check out the guide here: [API Integration Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/27680147056397-API-Integration-Guide). If you have any issues or need further assistance, feel free to reach out!

No worries! I'm here to help with your postback setup. Could you please let me know which platform you're using for the postback integration? This will help me provide you with the most accurate guidance.

so I have created a campaign on CLickFlare, now I have a link. Using this link I am creating a web event/postback. So this postback will be only working for this particular campaign on clickflare or for every campaign now?
do I need to create a postback for every individual campaign on ClickFlare?

Great question! Once you set up the postback correctly on Clickflare, it becomes a universal tracking tool accessible to all the campaigns within that advertising account. So, you can use the same postback for multiple campaigns within your Clickflare account. If you need more detailed instructions, feel free to check out this article: [How to Integrate a NewsBreak Postback with Clickflare](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/28421919800845-How-to-Integrate-a-NewsBreak-Postback-with-Clickflare).

When you set up a postback for a specific campaign on ClickFlare, it is typically configured to track conversions for that particular campaign. If you have multiple campaigns and want to track conversions for each one, you'll need to set up individual postbacks for each campaign. This ensures that the conversion data is accurately attributed to the correct campaign. If you need detailed instructions on how to integrate a NewsBreak postback with ClickFlare, you can refer to this article: [How to Integrate a NewsBreak Postback with Clickflare](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/28421919800845-How-to-Integrate-a-NewsBreak-Postback-with-Clickflare).
I am not asking about click flare. On that side I have sat everything up. I am asking about newsbreak. Do I need to create a new postback of NB for each new link I am using?

Ah, got it! On NewsBreak, once you have set up a postback correctly, it can be used as a universal tracking tool for multiple ads within the same advertising account. You don't need to create a new postback for each campaign or link. Just ensure that your initial setup is correct, and it will work across your campaigns.
perfect
